Generate XML from a CSV file.

See:

Packages
uk.co.dpawson  

 

Generate XML from a CSV file.

This is a bit of code to build an XML file from a csv file. Its not unique, but I like it. It addresses the problems of embedded & or < characters and embedded separators.

Usage

As well as the Java source, I've packaged it up for those who want to simply use it as a jar file. This gives a simple command line of: 

CSVToXML 1.2 from Dave Pawson
Usage: java CSVToXML [options] {param=value}...
Options: 
  -p filename     Take properties from named file  
  -o filename     Send output to named file  
  -i filename     Take CSV input from named file  
  -t              Display version and timing information 
  -?              Display this message

So a typical invocation might be:

>java -jar csv2xml.jar -i inputFile.csv -o outputFile.xml -p properties.txt

This specifies the input file, output file and properties file to be used.

That's it. Any problems let me know. The javadoc stuff is included in the zip file, as is a test properties file and a test csv file
